messages.title: National vision; local action
messages.content: The Conservatives have failed at every level. As your Labour candidate these are my pledges to you!

messages.title: Labour is economically responsible;
messages.content: Labour will not sell off your vital public services; Labour delivers a fair society for all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A properly funded, publicly owned NHS with the frontline staff needed to care for the health of all of us.
A rational housing policy that supports sustainable communities and is affordable for young people.
Support for our schools, apprenticeships, and training for our young people; a cut in tuition fees from £9000 to £6000.
No more shale gas fracking near our aquifers.
A successful economic plan for our place in the wider region.
Tough action on legal loopholes that allow people and companies who benefit from the UK to avoid paying tax in the UK.
A properly administered immigration regime with fair rules.
Decent pay and conditions for working people: an increase in the minimum wage, support for businesses that pay the living wage, no more zero hours contracts.

issues.education: Support for our schools, apprenticeships, and training for our young people; a cut in tuition fees from £9000 to £6000.
issues.environment: No more shale gas fracking near our aquifers.
issues.governance: Tough action on legal loopholes that allow people and companies who benefit from the UK to avoid paying tax in the UK.
issues.health: A properly funded, publicly owned NHS with the frontline staff needed to care for the health of all of us.
issues.immigration: A properly administered immigration regime with fair rules.

housing.content: A rational housing policy that supports sustainable communities and is affordable for young people.

images.caption: A message from Margaret Pinder, Labour's Prospective Parliamentary Candidate for Beverley & Holderness

leaflet.additionalNotes: Vote for Margaret Pinder in May 2015 Vote for a fair and successful Britain
